95217.「私 グランゼドーラ城に 立ち寄って\n <pc>さんと 知り合いの\n シオン:
I made a stop at Gran Zedora Castle, and I met
that man Shion who said he knew you.

95218.「そうしたら <pc>さんが\n 竜族の世界に行くって 聞いたから\n 私も 一:
Shion told me that you were going to the world
of the Nadravians, so I thought I'd come
along, too...

95219.「アロルドをむしばむ毒は 竜族のものでしょ？\n だから あれを治す解毒薬も 竜:
The venom that's poisoning Arold is of
Nadravian origin, right? I'm betting their
world has the antidote that can cure him.

95220.「古代遺跡で発見されて 復元されたばかりの\n 反重力飛行装置を ドゥラさんに頼:
I was lucky that I was able to use this
restored machine that Dura discovered from an
ancient ruin, but...

95221.「オマケで この人が ついてきちゃって……。: As a bonus, this guy gets to come along...

95222.「豪華な食事に 専属の召使い……。\n ドルワーム水晶宮での ひどい扱いに耐え切:
The luxurious meals, the personal servants...
I couldn't stand such horrible treatment at
the palace! This was my ticket outta there!

95223.「それに 竜族の世界には 想像を超えるような\n ガラクタが あるにちげえねえで:
Besides, that world must have loads and loads
of junk. That's why, I'm gonna go in there
and...

95224.「ガラクタという ガラクタを\n 手当たり次第に 持ち帰ってやるんですッ！\n:
...bring all sorts of junk back home with me!
Wooooo!! I can't wait!

95226.「なんだか 奇妙な場所でごぜえますな。: What a weird place this is...

95227.「本当に 不思議な場所ね……。\n この通路って どこまで続いているのかしら。:
It is pretty weird, isn't it? Wonder where
this passage leads...

95228.「ああっ！ ダストンさん！\n あまり 遠くに行っては……！: Wait, Duston! Don't go too far ahead!

95240.<center>あれだけ 来ないでって 言っておいたのに\nついに ここまで 来:
I told you not to come here... but it seems
you've finally come anyway, didn't you...

95241.<if_woman><center>このまま 姉ちゃんが 進むというなら……\n:
If you really mean to continue on this path,
then I'll...

95242.「……ああ よかった。\n お気づきに なられたようですね。: Oh, thank goodness. You're finally awake.

95243.「どこか 痛むところは ありませんか？\n ご自分の名前は 言えますか？:
Are you in any pain? Do you remember your
name?

95244.「……そうですか。あなたの名前は\n <pc>さんと いうのですね。\n では:
I see. So your name is <pc>...
Do you remember what happened?<yesno><close>

95245.「あなたは ひどい やけどを負って\n この近くで 倒れていたんですよ。\n だ:
I found you unconscious nearby, covered in
severe burns. I brought you to this village
so you could recover.

95246.「……炎に包まれた鳥に やられたのですね。\n ひどい やけどを負っていましたが:
A giant flaming bird attacked you... that's
why you were burned so badly. No need to
worry, as I've taken care of your wounds.

95247.「……神官エステラさま。\n 救援の願い出を 聞き届けていただき\n 感謝いたし:
Priestess Estella... thank you for listening
to our pleas for help.

95248.「ただ今 村の若い衆が 皆で\n 魔炎鳥の討伐に 向かっているところです。:
The village's youths are currently headed to
defeat the Darkflame.

95249.「これに 神官さま方のチカラも加われば\n あの魔炎鳥を 討伐することができるで:
With the priests' help, we will surely be able
to defeat it. Please, lend us your strength.

95250.「……ところで エステラさまの姿しか\n 見当たりませんが 他の神官さま方は\n:
However, only you are here, Estella...
When will the other priests arrive to assist
us?

95251.「ネオル村長。申し訳ありませんが\n 今 教団には 救援を出す余裕がありません。:
My apologies, Chief Neoru... but the Order
can't afford to send any help as of now. That
is why I've come here to help as I can.

95252.「……つまり 教団の助けは来ないと？: You're saying the Order won't help us...?

95254.「なんということだ……。\n このままでは アペカの村は……。:
What horrible news... if our predicament
continues, Apeka Village will...

95255.「ネオル村長。\n ひとつ ご相談が……。:
Chief Neoru. There is something I'd like
to discuss...

95256.「こちらの方を しばらくの間\n この村に 置いてはもらえないでしょうか？:
Would it be all right if this person stays in
the village for a while?

95257.「……しかし 見なれない姿をしていますが\n いったい この方は何者なんですか？:
But I've never seen them before...
Just who are they?

95258.「もし 我々に 害をなす者だとしたら……。: If it's someone who means to threaten us...

95259.「いえ……。この方は 敵ではありません。\n アストルティアという世界から 迷い:
No... they aren't our enemy. I believe they
are an outsider from the world of Astoltia
who somehow wandered here.

95261.「迷える者に手を差し伸べることも 教団の使命。\n この一帯が 魔炎鳥の脅威に:
The Order's mission is to help those who are
lost. We can't leave this area exposed to the
Darkflame's threat any longer.

95262.「……ふむ。\n 神官さまの頼みなら 仕方ありませんな。\n いいでしょう……。:
Hmm... since it's a priestess' request, I
will make an exception. All right...

95263.「ただし しきたりが ありますのでな。\n 村に留まる者には ナドラガさまに\n:
However, we have a custom you must follow.
Those who wish to stay here must offer a
prayer to the great Nadraga.

95264.「村を出て 東に行くと 古いほこらがあります。\n 竜族の礼にのっとった祈りを:
East of the village, there is an old shrine.
I will teach you the way Nadravians pray.
Then, you can pray to Nadraga there.

95266.「ナドラガさまに 祈りを捧げてきたら\n あなたを 村に受け入れることにしましょ:
Once you offer a prayer to Nadraga, you will
be accepted into the village. You may go now.

95267.「では 私は 村の周囲の様子を見てきます。\n <pc>さんは 村の東にある ほ:
I'll go and take a look around the village.
You should head to the shrine east of the
village. We'll meet each other again soon.

95268.<center>あれだけ 来るなって 言っといたのに\nついに ここまで 来ちま:
I told you not to come here... but it seems
you've come anyway, haven't you...

95269.<center>あんなに 来ないでって 言っておいたのに\nついに ここまで:
I told you not to come here... but it seems
you've finally come anyway, haven't you...

95270.<center>あんなに 来ちゃダメって 言っといたのに\nついに ここまで 来:
I told you not to come here... but it seems
you've finally come anyway, haven't you...

95271.<center>このまま <pc>が 進むというなら……\nオレは 絶対に……:
If you mean to continue on this path,
<pc>...
I'll have no choice but to...

95272.<center>このまま <pc>が 進むというなら……\nあたしは 絶対に……:
If you mean to continue on this path,
<pc>...
I'll have no choice but to...

95273.<if_woman><center>このまま お姉ちゃんが 進むというなら……\:
If you really mean to continue on this path,
then I'll have no choice but to...

95274.「祈りは 無事に 捧げられたようですね。\n <pc>さん。:
I see you've successfully offered your
prayers, <pc>.

95275.「あなたのことが 心配になって\n 私も 来てしまいました。:
I was worried about you, so I decided to come
here as well.

95276.「やけどのほうは もう平気なようですね。\n キズの治りが早くて おどろかされま:
It looks like the burns are no longer ailing
you. I'm surprised at how quickly
your wounds have healed.

95277.「見えますか？\n 遠くに見える あの竜の形をした岩が……。:
You see it, right? That dragon-shaped rock in
the distance?

95278.「あれは 神代の昔から\n この世界を守っていたといわれる\n 竜族の神ナドラガ:
It is said to be the head of Nadraga, the
Nadravian god who has protected this world
since ancient times.

95279.「ナドラガ神のご加護が あるから\n 私たち竜族は このような過酷な環境でも\n:
Thanks to Nadraga's blessings, we are able to
survive in this harsh environment.

95280.「ですが 今は\n その ご加護のチカラをもってしても……。: However, even with the aid of his blessings...

95281.「……村長の言う しきたりには 従いましたし\n これで あなたも 受け入れても:
You have followed the chief's custom, and will
now be accepted. Let's return to Apeka
Village.

95284.「ひどいケガ……。\n 魔炎鳥に やられたのでしょうか。\n だとしたら この方:
He's badly injured... was this the Darkflame's
doing? If that's the case, he must be from
Apeka...

95285.「私が この方を 村へ連れていきましょう。\n これも 神官たる者の務めです。:
I will bring him to the village. This is
another duty of a priestess.

95286.「キズが治ったばかりの <pc>さんに\n 頼むわけにも いきませんから。\n:
I can't ask for your help when you've only
just recovered from your wounds. I will
meet you back in the village.

95287.「ねぇねぇ。\n あれって ギダ兄ちゃんじゃない？: Hey... isn't that Gida over there?

95288.「おお そうじゃ。ギダじゃ。: Oh, you're right. That is Gida.

95289.「皆の衆！ ギダじゃ！\n ギダが 帰ってきたぞーーー！: Look, everyone! It's Gida! Gida's back!

95292.「なぜ だまっている……。\n まさか お前以外 全滅したとでもいうのか？:
You aren't saying anything... Don't tell me
you're the only one who survived?

95293.「なんと……。\n では どうして ひとりで帰ってきたのだ？\n よもや 逃げだ:
What...? Then why did you return alone?
Surely you didn't run away, did you?

95294.「……ひとりで 逃げてきたというのか？: You mean to say you ran away by yourself?

95296.「おくびょう者め！！\n なぜ 最後まで戦わなかった！？:
You COWARD!! Why didn't you stay and fight
until the very end?!

95297.「他の男たちは 命を犠牲にしてまで\n 戦い抜いたというのに ひとりで こそこそ:
The others sacrificed their lives to fight,
and you decide to run back home? And you still
call yourself a Nadravian man?!

95298.「楽器を弾くことしか能がない 役立たずめ！\n お前なぞ こうしてやる！:
All you care about is playing that instrument,
you worthless nobody! This is what you get!

95299.「ネオル村長。怒るのは 後にしてください。\n この方は ひどいケガを負っていま:
Chief Neoru, now is not the time to get angry.
He is badly injured and needs to be treated
before anything else.

95301.「ナドラガさまのご加護を 得られたようですな。\n どうやら あやしい者では な:
I can see that you've received Nadraga's
blessing. In that case, you are not a
suspicious person and are allowed to stay.

95302.「しかし あの役立たずが生き残り\n レゼロのやつが 死んでしまうとは……。:
That useless man survives while Rezero is left
to die...

95303.「ギダの兄 レゼロは 弟と ちがって\n 責任感の強い 屈強な竜族の男でしてね…:
Gida's brother Rezero was a strong and
responsible Nadravian man, unlike him. Had he
survived, there'd have been hope. But...

95304.「……失礼。あなたには 関係のない話でしたな。\n きっと お疲れでしょう。\n:
I'm sorry. None of that concerns you. I'm sure
you must be exhausted. I've already spoken to
the innkeeper, so please get some rest.

95305.「聞いたかい？\n ギダは もうずいぶん 回復したそうだよ。:
Did you hear? Gida has already recovered quite
well.

95306.「なんでも 神官さまが ひと晩つきっきりで\n 治療を ほどこされたそうじゃ。\:
I heard the priestess spent the whole night
giving him treatment. We truly are
blessed.

95307.「しかし 弟のギダが生き残って\n 村いちばんの勇士である\n 兄のレゼロが 亡:
But I don't understand how Gida survived while
Rezero died... Rezero was this village's
bravest warrior...

95308.「わしの息子も 魔炎鳥にやられたんかのお……。\n すぐに わしも あとを追うこ:
I wonder if that Darkflame got my son, too...
I won't be too far behind at this rate.

95309.「いくら 神官さまでも たった ひとりじゃ\n 魔炎鳥を倒すことなど できんじゃ:
Even as a priestess, she alone can't defeat
that Darkflame... this village is as good as
gone.

95310.「まだ 完治とは言えませんが\n 時間が経てば 痛みも治まるでしょう。:
It hasn't completely healed yet, but the pain
should slowly get better.

95313.「あなたは 異世界から来た人らしいね。\n 神官さまから 話は聞いたよ。:
The priestess told me that you come from
another world.

95314.「ギダさん。つらいこととは 思いますが\n 魔炎鳥との戦いで 何があったのか\n:
I know this must be hard for you, Gida... but
could you tell us what happened during the
battle against the Darkflame?

95315.「もしかしたら この村を救うための\n 手がかりが あるかもしれないのです。:
Perhaps it can give us some clues on how to
save the village.

95317.「ボクたちは 全員で魔炎鳥と戦い もう少しで\n 倒せるところまで あの魔物を追:
We all managed to corner the Darkflame and
had nearly defeated it.

95318.「魔炎鳥が 近くを流れるマグマを食べると\n たちまち キズが回復していったんだ:
The Darkflame consumed the magma that flowed
nearby, and quickly recovered all of its
wounds.

95319.「それまでの戦いで 疲れきっていた 仲間たちは\n 次々と やられていった……。:
Exhausted by the battle, my comrades were all
killed one by one... my brother and I were
the only ones left.

95320.「だけど 兄さんは 何を思ったのか 突然\n 危険をかえりみず 魔炎鳥のしっぽに:
However, my brother thought on his feet, and
recklessly ripped off the Darkflame's tail
feathers.

95321.「それを ボクに託して こう言ったんだ。: He gave them to me and said...

95322.「炎樹の丘へ行け！\n あの曲だ！ あの曲を弾くんだ！: "Go to Firetree Hill and play that song!"

95323.「意味は わからなかったけど それを聞いて\n ボクは走りだした。当然 兄さんも:
I had no idea what he meant, but when I heard
that, I just started running. I thought he was
right behind me. That's when...

95324.「兄さんは 持っていた火薬ツボを爆発させて\n 落盤を起こしたんだ。\n ボクが:
He detonated his jar of gunpowder and caused
a cave in. Just so he could buy me time
to escape...

95325.「覚えているのは それだけだよ。\n だけど 兄さんは なぜ突然あんなことを……:
That's all I remember. But why did he suddenly
do that...?

95326.「でも 何らかの目的があったはずです……。: There must have been some reason...

95327.「お兄さんが言っていた 炎樹の丘に\n もしかしたら 手かがりがあるかもしれませ:
Maybe there is a clue at the Firetree Hill
that your brother mentioned. Why don't we
go there together?

95329.「あそこには ボクたちの思い出が眠っています。\n 兄さんの言葉を信じて ボクは:
Our memories are sleeping on that hill. I'll
believe my brother's words and make
my way there.

95330.「<pc>さん。\n ギダさんには まだ 私たちの助けが必要です。\n 一緒に来:
Gida still needs our help, <pc>.
Will you please come with us?

95331.「炎樹の丘は 村を出て\n ずっと 南に行った先の森林地帯にあります。:
Firetree Hill is located in a wooded area far
south of the village.

95332.「私たちは <pc>さんの後を\n ついていきますので……。\n それでは 出発:
We'll follow your lead... so let's be on our
way.

95334.「たしか この辺りだな。: It should be somewhere around here.

95335.「演奏していると 兄さんが ほめてくれました。\n 兄さんの喜ぶカオを見たくて\:
My brother praised me whenever I played, and
I loved to see his happy face. That's why I
played for him ever since I was little.

95336.「だけど みんなが この世界で生きるために\n がんばっているのに 楽器なんか弾:
But the chief said I should be ashamed of
playing an instrument while everyone else is
doing their best to survive...

95337.「村での演奏が禁止になったから この丘に\n 兄さんとふたりで来て ハープを埋め:
I came here with my brother and buried my harp, since it was forbidden to play in the village. I was sad and cried for quite a
long time...

95338.「でも 兄さんが いつか\n 暮らしが楽になったら また演奏を\n 聴かせてほし:
But Rezero said that one day, when life gets
easier, he'd like to hear my songs again...

95340.「お兄さんのために弾いていた曲……。\n よかったら 聴かせてくれませんか？:
The song that you played for your brother...
Do you think you could play it for us?

95343.「炎のように 燃え上がる 聖なる鳥よ。\n 天より高く舞い上がり 見守りたまえ。:
The holy bird who burns alight...
Through the heavens you take flight...
All of dragonkind, forever in your sight...

95344.「今のは もしかして この曲の歌詞……？\n あなたは この曲を知っているんです:
Could these be the lyrics to this song? Have
you heard this song before?

95345.「これは かつて\n この地の守り神である聖鳥に\n 祈りを捧げるため 奏でられ:
It's a song that was once played to pray to
Flamia, the divine guardian of this place...

95346.「祈り鳥の曲といいます。: It is called the Birdsong Prayer.

95347.「昔 この地の竜族が 聖鳥の怒りを買った時に\n 彼らが 祈り鳥の曲を奏でて 怒:
Legends say that long ago, when the Nadravians of this region angered Flamia, they played that song to calm it down, and the land was
saved.

95348.「そうだったのか……。昔 兄さんとふたりで\n 大神殿に行った時に たまたま こ:
I had no idea... I happened to hear it when my
brother and I visited the Grand Temple a long
time ago. I was just playing from memory...

95349.「なぜ 兄さんは\n この曲を弾けと言ったんだろう……？: Why did he tell me to play this song...?

95351.「ギダさん。お兄さんから 受け取ったという\n 魔炎鳥の尾羽を 見せてもらえませ:
Could you show me those feathers you said
your brother gave to you?

95353.「真紅の聖鳥は その身に宿す。\n 地上をさまよう 死者の想いを。\n そして:
Crimson Flamia, within your breast...
The desires of those who cannot rest...
Lead them beyond, at our behest...

95354.「……今のも 歌詞の一部です。\n もしかしたら お兄さんは\n この曲の歌詞を:
Those were also lyrics to that song... perhaps
your brother knew what they were.

95355.「きっと 気がついたのでしょう。\n 魔炎鳥に生えていた １枚の真っ赤な羽を見て:
He must've realized... when he saw the
Darkflame had a single crimson feather, he
knew it was really Flamia....

95356.「そして この曲でなければ\n 魔炎鳥の怒りを しずめられないことを……。:
And that only this song can appease the
Darkflame's anger...

95357.「だから 兄さんは 命を犠牲にしてまで\n ボクを生かしたと……？ 祈り鳥の曲を:
Is that why he sacrificed himself for me...?
Because I'm the only one who can play the
Birdsong Prayer?

95358.「ウデが立つだけでなく\n 深い知識を 持っていた方なのですね……。:
He was not only skilled, but a man of great
knowledge, too...

95359.「ええ。自慢の兄ですよ。\n その兄さんが そこまでの想いをもって\n ボクを:
Yeah. I'm really proud of him. If he had such
strong feelings about me to keep me alive,
then...

95360.「その想いに こたえなければいけない！: I can't let his feelings die in vain!

95361.「<pc>さん 神官さま。ボクは これから\n 村の東にある 煉獄の谷へ向かいま:
I am going to Hell's Valley, which is located
east of the village. The Darkflame's nest is
deeper within the valley.

95362.「魔炎鳥の棲み家への道は\n 落盤によって ふさがれてしまいましたが\n たしか:
The pathway there was blocked by fallen rocks,
but there should be a narrow side passage
that can lead us there.

95363.「祈り鳥の曲を弾いて 魔炎鳥の怒りを\n しずめるのですね。ならば 私も同行しま:
If you can play the song to appease the
Darkflame, then I shall accompany you.

95365.「わかりました……。\n それが あなたの選択なら\n その意思を 尊重しましょ:
All right... if that is your choice, then I
will respect that.

95366.「ですが もし 気が変わったら\n アペカの村の東にある 煉獄の谷へ\n 来てく:
If you happen to change your mind, please head
to Hell's Valley to the east of the village.

95368.「煉獄の谷は アペカの村の東……。\n それでは 出発しましょう。:
Hell's Valley is to the east of the village.
Let's make our way there.

95370.「あいつのせいで 兄さんも……。: Because of you, my brother is...!

95371.「ギダさん。これは 復讐ではありません。\n お気持ちは わかりますが\n お兄:
Now is not the time to think about revenge.
I can understand your anger, but for your
brother's sake, you must remain calm.

95375.「完全に 我を失っているようです。\n ギダさんの演奏で 魔炎鳥の怒りをしずめる:
It's gone completely insane. In order to
appease the Darkflame with Gida's
performance, we must first calm it down.

95376.「私は ギダさんの守りに専念しますので\n 魔炎鳥を 弱らせてください。\n 頼:
I will concentrate on protecting Gida, so
please focus on wearing the Darkflame down,
<cs_pchero>.

95377.「ギダさんの演奏で 魔炎鳥の怒りをしずめるには\n まず 大人しくさせなければい:
If we're to quell its anger with Gida's
song, we have to calm it down first.

95378.「私は ギダさんの守りに専念しますので\n 魔炎鳥を 弱らせてください。\n 頼:
I will concentrate on protecting Gida, so
please focus on wearing the Darkflame down,
<cs_pchero>.

95379.「ギダさん！ 今です！\n 祈り鳥の曲を弾いてください！: Gida! Quickly! Play the Birdsong Prayer!

95381.<center>炎のように 燃え上がる 聖なる鳥よ。\n天より高く舞い上がり 見:
The holy bird who burns alight...
Through the heavens you take flight...

95382.<center>我ら 竜の民を。永遠に……。: All of dragonkind, forever in your sight...

95383.「美しい……。\n これが 聖鳥……。: How beautiful... so this is Flamia...

95384.「真紅の聖鳥は その身に宿す。\n 地上をさまよう 死者の想いを。\n そして:
Crimson Flamia, within your breast...
The desires of those who cannot rest...
Lead them beyond, at our behest...

95385.「こ…これは。もしかして\n 亡くなった 仲間たちの想いのかけら……？:
What is... could these be the remnants of
those who were killed...?

95387.<center>ギダよ。オレたちは 聖鳥とひとつになる。\nひとつとなって 遠い:
Gida... we are all one with Flamia. Together,
we will watch over you from the skies above.
For the future of our land...

95388.「いやだ！ いかないでくれ！\n ボクを ひとりにしないでくれ！:
No! Don't leave! Please don't leave me here
all alone!

95389.<center>これからは お前が村を守るんだ。\nお前ならできると 信じている:
It's your duty now to protect the village.
I have no doubt you can do it...

95390.「そんなの 無理だよ……。\n ボクは 兄さんみたいに 強くないんだ！:
I can't do that... I'm not strong like you
are!

95391.<center>お前は 人の弱さを許すことができる。\nその やさしさこそが お:
You are able to forgive the weaknesses of
others. That kindness is your strength.

95393.「聖鳥よ。この地の守り手よ。\n 彼らの魂を 無事に\n 安息の地へと 送りとど:
O Flamia, the guardian of this land. Deliver
their souls safely to their place of rest.

95395.「<cs_pchero>さん。本当に助かりました。\n では 村まで 戻ることに:
Thank you so much for your help,
<cs_pchero>. Let's return to the village.

95396.「炎の領界の守り手である 聖鳥が\n 闇に 取り込まれるなんて……。\n これも:
How could the Fire Realm's protector be
tainted by darkness...? Is this also the power
of the Evil Will...?

95397.「さきほど 空を飛んでいたのは\n 伝説の聖鳥じゃ！ まちがいないぞ！:
That was the legendary Flamia that just flew
overhead! I'm certain!

95398.「まさか 死ぬ前に\n 聖鳥を この目で拝むことができるとは！\n こんなに あ:
I never thought the day would come where I'd
see Flamia for myself! I've never been so
happy to be alive!

95399.「しかし 村長さん。\n なぜ 今になって 聖鳥が現れたんかのお？: But, Chief... why did Flamia suddenly appear?

95400.「わしにも わからん……。\n いったい 何が起こったというのか……。:
That, I do not know... What in the world is
going on...?

95401.「……そのことについては\n 私から お話ししましょう。: If you'll allow me, I'll explain why.

95402.エステラは これまでに起きたことを\nすべて 村人たちに話した。:
Estella told the villagers about the events
that had transpired.

95403.「なんと……。\n そのようなことが 起きていたとは……。: Oh my... I wasn't aware that's what happened.

95404.「はい……。\n 炎の領界の守り手である存在が\n 闇のチカラに 取り込まれてい:
Indeed... the guardian of the Fire Realm was
possessed by a dark power.

95405.「そして それを聖鳥の姿に戻したのが\n ギダだと……。\n 我々は ギダに救わ:
And it was Gida who restored Flamia... so he
is the one who saved us all...

95407.「思えば わしは お前に対して\n さんざん つらく当たってきたな。:
Thinking back, I have treated you harshly,
haven't I?

95408.「本当に 申し訳ないことをした……。\n 今さら 謝っても ゆるしてもらえまい。:
I'm deeply sorry for my actions... but even if
I apologize now, I don't deserve forgiveness.
I'll accept any punishment you choose.

95410.「どうか アタマを上げてください。\n ボクは たしかに 役立たずでした。\n:
Please, raise your head. I WAS useless. I only
acted in my own self interest.

95411.「これからは 亡くなった みんなの分まで\n ボクが がんばって 村を守っていき:
From now on, I will work hard to protect the
village for all the people that we lost.
Please, lend me your strength, too!

95412.「ありがとう ギダよ……。\n 頼りにしているぞ。: Thank you, Gida... I won't let you down.

95413.「仲間たちの魂が 安息の地へと運ばれていく。\n みんな 祈ろう……。:
The souls of our comrades are being guided
to their place of rest. Let us pray...

95415.「どうか お気を悪くせず聞いてください。:
Please don't take offense and listen
carefully.

95416.「……今だから 告白しますが\n 私は これまで <pc>さんが\n 信用できる:
...I must confess that I have been testing
you to see if I can trust you.

95417.「もしも 村に……竜族たちに\n 危害を加えるような方なら\n 私が あなたを止:
If you were a danger to the village... or any
Nadravians, for that matter, I would've
stopped you.

95418.「……ですが 行動を共にして\n <pc>さんが とても強く やさしく\n 信用:
However... through our cooperation, I learned
that you're a very strong, kind, and
trustworthy person.

95419.「今まで あなたに いろいろと\n 押し付けるような まねをしてしまい\n 本当:
I deeply apologize for my rude behavior and
being suspicious of your intentions...

95420.「……アペカの村だけではなく\n 今 この世界には あなたのような\n 強くて:
Not only the village, but the entire world
needs more strong and courageous
people like you...

95421.「そこで あなたには\n こちらも 受け取っていただきたいのです。: As thanks, I would also like to give you this.

95423.「私が書いた その紹介状があれば\n ナドラガ教団の大神殿がある\n 聖都エジャ:
With that letter I wrote, you'll be granted
access to Ejarna, the holy city. That is where
the Nadraga Order's Grand Temple is located.

95424.「聖都エジャルナは ここから西にある橋を\n 渡ったところにあります。\n もし:
Ejarna is just across the bridge to the west
of here. If you don't mind, please make your
way there.

95425.「私は先に戻って このことを\n 総主教さまに 報告しておきましょう。\n それ:
I will return and report this to the
Patriarch. I'll be waiting there for your
arrival.

95427.「ここは ナドラガ教団が治める神聖な都。\n 貴様のような素性の知れぬ者を\n:
This is the sacred city of the Nadraga Order.
We cannot allow a stranger like you inside.
Now begone!

95428.「<pc>さん。私だけでは\n ギダさんを守りきれるか わかりません。\n どう:
I don't know if I can protect Gida on my own,
<pc>. Would you be willing to lend
us your help?<yesno><close>

114812.「せめてもの 償いの品です。\n どうか こちらを受け取ってください。:
Please accept this. It's the least I can do to
apologize for my presumptions about you.

117184.「だけど 地獄は それからだった……。: But that's when things got worse...

118503.「いた……。\n あいつが 村の仲間を殺したんだ……。:
There it is... that thing that killed my
comrades from the village...

122908.「ふふっ おどろいた？\n この 反重力飛行装置のおかげで\n あなたに 追いつ:
Hehe, did I surprise you? Thanks to this
anti-gravity flying machine, I was able to
catch up to you!

122909.<pc>は ネオル村長に\n竜族の礼にのっとった祈りを 教えてもらった。:
<pc> was taught by Chief Neoru
how to pray in the manner of the Nadravians.

122910.「それに お前と 一緒に 討伐に行った\n 他の男たちは どうしたのだ？:
And what happened to the others who went with
you?

122911.「<pc>さん……でしたかな？\n 旅の方に みっともないところを\n お見せし:
<pc>. was it? I apologize that
you had to witness such an embarrassment
on your journey.

122912.「……休んだら すぐに 去ったほうがいい。\n この村は もう おしまいでしょう:
As soon as you're rested, you should leave.
This village is certainly doomed...

122913.老人たちは 暗いカオをして\nうなだれながら 去っていった……。:
The old folks left with a dark expression,
their heads hung low...

122914.<center>後のことは頼んだぞ オレの自慢の弟よ……。:
The rest I leave to you, brother. I'm so
proud...

122916.「楽器を弾くのを やめさせたり\n 兄のレゼロと比べて お前を\n 役立たずと:
I even forced you to stop playing your
instrument, and compared you to your brother,
calling you useless.

124196.「えっ……？ 自分の他に\n 誰か 一緒にいなかったか……ですか？:
Huh? You want to know if there was anyone else
with you...?

124197.「私が 通りかかったとき\n あそこにいたのは あなただけでした。: You were the only one there when I found you.

124198.「教団が所蔵する文献に 書かれていました。\n アストルティアには 私たち 竜族:
It's written in the Order's archives. Astoltia
is inhabited by many races that are different
from us Nadravians.
